# polytomic_postgresql_connection (Data Source)

PostgresSQL Connection

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "polytomic_postgresql_connection" "postgresql" {
  id = "aab123aa-27f3-abc1-9999-abcde123a4aa"
}
```
